law.text:
As used in KRS 247.413 to 247.430:
"Council" means the Kentucky Council on Agriculture.
"Executive director" means the chief administrative officer of the council.
law.history: Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 447, sec. 16, effective April 12, 1982. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 155, sec. 128, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 53, sec. 1. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 87, sec. 4(1).

metadata.former-history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 42c-31.
metadata.note: Former KRS 247.410, "Meetings of commission", was recodified from 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942 from Ky. Stat. sec. 42c-31. -- This section was considered obsolete and was omitted from the 1948 edition of the KRS and subsequent editions.
